text: Adrián Melosi (born 10 December 1956) is an Argentine equestrian. He competed in the team jumping event at the 1984 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Argentine male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Argentina Category:Equestrians at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Adrián Melosi
